name: Orange Adventure
description: Have fun with this amazing tribute to the best SNES and MEGADRIVE games!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers. Avoid any hardware using Intel graphics chips. Additional Notes: Mouse, & Keyboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers. Avoid any hardware using Intel graphics chips. Additional Notes: Microsoft XBOX Joystick
